double a_axis ( 0  )

Holds the value of the rotational/angular control axis.

double a_scale ( 0.  5)

Holds a percent multiplier for sensitivity control. Default = 50%.

const int angularAxisIndex ( 2  )

rotational axis index in the joy topic array from the logitech Extreme 3D Pro

void bilinearCalc ( double &  axis)

Controls variable joystick sensitivity. Small movements that use a small percent of the maximum control vecotr magnitude have a lower sensitivity than larger movements with the joystick.

Parameters
[in,out]axisTakes in a reference to the axis (a_axis, l_axisLR/FB, v_axis)

Definition at line 64 of file drive_control.cpp.

const double bilinearRatio ( 1.  5)

Variable for determining the bilinear threshold.

const double bilinearThreshold ( 1.0/  bilinearRatio)

At what percent of the joysticks axis magnitude (-1 to 1) to apply the additional thrust.

void controlCallback ( copilot_interface::copilotControlParamsConfig &  config,
uint32_t  level 
)

Handles copilot input: updates thrusters, enables sensitivity, and enables inversion. Callback to anything published by the dynamic reconfigure copilot page

Parameters
[in]&configNew copilot_interface param
[in]levelThe OR-ing of all the values that have changed in the copilot_interface param (not used yet)
